name: Takeoff from East Midlands (Flybe Dash 8 Q400)
description:
Departure from East Midlands onboard Flybe Bombardier DHC8-Q400 G-JECX, operating flight BE262 from East Midlands (EMA) to Edinburgh (EDI) on 21 October 2014.

**FULL FLIGHT:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wdEukJXMAy8 **

We pushback from the gate at East Midlands before taking a single engine taxi to runway 27.  We then depart to the west overhead Donington Park circuit before turning right to the west of Derby and climbing to a cruising altitude of 24,000ft.

Video taken from seat 7A.

Airline:  Flybe
Flight:  BE262
Aircraft:  Bombardier DHC8-Q400 G-JECX
From:  East Midlands (EMA)
To:  Edinburgh (EDI)
Departure:  09:09
Arrival:  09:58
Flight Time:  00:49
Seat:  7A
Flight Path:  http://goo.gl/W8EWY3

Please enjoy the flight and feel free to subscribe/comment!

GoPro Hero 3

✈ ✈
